boardgame.name: Yomi
Yomi: Fighting Card Game
boardgame.description: Yomi is a card game that simulates a fighting game. It tests your ability to predict how your opponents will act and your ability to judge the relative value of cards from one situation to the next. Also, it lets you do fun combos and be a panda. There are 10 characters to choose from, each with their own deck, abilities, and style. Each deck also doubles as a regular deck of playing cards with beautiful artwork (the complete game features a whopping 120 different character illustrations)._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Yomi is the Japanese word for _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;ldquo;reading_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;rdquo;, in this case as in reading the mind of your opponent. Yomi: Fighting Card Game is a simple competitive card game that simulates a fight between two characters. Each deck in Yomi represents one character, with 10 decks in the first release._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Champion fighting game tournament player and tournament organizer David Sirlin designed the game to test the skills of Valuation and Yomi. Valuation refers to your ability to judge the relative value of moves (or cards) as they change over the course of the game. Yomi, the game's title, refers to your ability to guess which moves your opponent will make. There is more to it than guessing, though: some players have the uncanny ability to _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;ldquo;guess_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;rdquo; right almost every time, no matter the game._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;The core mechanic is a paper-rock-scissors guessing game between attack, throw, and block/dodge (sometimes modified by special ability cards). Attacks and throws usually let you follow up with combo cards from your hand, while blocks let you draw a card. While it first seems _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot;just random,_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot; you soon discover that the unequal and uncertain payoffs in this guessing game allow you really read what the opponent will do. Yomi captures the kind of mind games that occur during the high level in fighting game tournaments._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Reimplemented by:_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; Yomi (second edition)_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;

Sirlin Games (SRN YMD01) Yomi: Fighting Card Game is a simple competitive card game that simulates a battle between two characters. Each deck in Yomi represents one character and can also be used as a regular deck of playing cards with beautiful artwork. This Complete First Edition of Yomi contains: -All 10 character decks on playing card stock with coating, not cheapy CCG card material -8-page rulebook with FAQ, plus 10 copies of 1-pages quick rules -Two large, beautiful playmats, each with different art and integrated life counters -Two red glass beads and two blue glass beads to track your life total on the playmats

Hi there! Up for sale is Yomi Complete First Edition. I have limited closet space and need to sell some games. These are games that are in near-new condition, played only once, and just didn_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;t click with my gaming group. They come from a smoke-free, adult home with no kids and no pets. I take absolute meticulous care of all my board games. I do not allow friends to eat and drink while playing these games. Hopefully they can find a home in your inventory where they_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;ll be played and loved :) I_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;m new to BGG, so I don_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;t have much feedback, but you can check my eBay account (x.metal), which has over 820 feedback with no negatives. I_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;ll combine shipping for multiple items. Send me a geekmail if you have any questions. Thanks for looking!

Sirlin Games (SRN YM01) $15.99 [Yomi Grave and Jaina] Sirlin Games (SRN YM02) $15.99 [Yomi Midori and Setsuki] Sirlin Games (SRN YM03) $15.99 [Yomi Rook and DeGrey] Sirlin Games (SRN YM04) $15.99 [Yomi Valerie and Geiger] Sirlin Games (SRN YM05) $15.99 [Yomi Lum and Argagarg]
**
Yomi is a card game that simulates a fighting game. It tests your ability to predict how your opponents will act and your ability to judge the relative value of cards from one situation to the next. Also, it lets you do fun combos and be a panda. There are 10 characters to choose from, each with their own deck, abilities, and style. Each deck also doubles as a regular deck of playing cards with beautiful artwork (the complete game features a whopping 120 different character illustrations).

Sirlin Games (SRN YM01)
Yomi: Fighting Card Game is a simple competitive card game that simulates a battle between two characters. Each deck in Yomi represents one character and can also be used as a regular deck of playing cards with beautiful artwork. Grave is careful and in control. His Dragonheart attack is tied for the fastest in the game. Sometimes he can look at your hand cards, other times he counters whatever you tried to do. His sister Jaina, by contrast, is fiery and reckless. She can damage herself to buyback her attacks, and to change her mind mid-combat in desperate situations.

I_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;m selling a complete first edition set of David Sirlin_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s phenomenal card game Yomi. It simulates the tactical action of one-on-one fighting games such as Street Fighter and it is designed beautifully. In fact, the only reason I_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;m selling it, is because I lack people to play it with! My game is in near mint condition and complete with the two rubber play mats, life counters and 10 character decks. I will consider shipping it world wide, but I prefer keeping it within Europe to keep the shipping costs low. Shipping within Europe will be between 20 and 30 euros depending on added insurance, tracking and the country (to the U.S. it will be a bit higher). Of course I will try to minimize additional customs charges if possible. Please contact me with any questions, or to make a serious counter offer. If you are located in The Netherlands, picking it up would also an option.
